idea-plugin.name: D8gerAutoCode
idea-plugin.description:
自动生成代码插件, 单表增删查找+分页一键搞定.
Automatic code generation plug-in, single-table addition and deletion search + paging in one click.


    1.20
  • 一键生成数据表定义SQL/Mapper/Service/Controller, 单表增删改查+分页一键搞定
  • 结合SwaggerApi, 一键生成带文档定义Vo及Controller, 支持Vo自动排序
  • 一键生成文件, 默认快捷键`cmd`+`alt`+`shift`+`D`
  • 支持用户自定义配置, 指定生成哪些文件及文件author等
  • 预留彩蛋, 在IDEA中编辑空白文件输入'd8ger'即可得到配置文件模板, 后期会增加其他代码彩蛋
  • SwaggerVo字段排序, 默认快捷键`cmd`+`alt`+`shift`+`O`
    1.20
  • One-click generation of data table definition SQL / Mapper / Service / Controller, single table addition, deletion, modification and search + paging in one click
  • Combined with SwaggerApi, one-click generation of Vo and Controller with document definition, support Vo automatic sorting
  • Generate files in one click, default shortcut`cmd`+`alt`+`shift`+`D`
  • Support user-defined configuration, specify which files and file authors are generated, etc.
  • Reserve Easter eggs, edit the blank file in IDEA and enter 'd8ger' to get the configuration file template. Other code Easter eggs will be added later
  • SwaggerVo field auto sorting, default shortcut`cmd`+`alt`+`shift`+`O`
